locations.name: Mysore
locations.description: One of India's best skydiving locations with scenic views of Chamundi Hills.

locations.name: Aamby Valley
locations.description: Premium skydiving destination offering tandem jumps with spectacular views.

locations.name: Dhana
locations.description: A well-known drop zone for static line jumps and tandem skydiving.

locations.name: Pondicherry
locations.description: Offers stunning coastal views while parachuting from high altitudes.

locations.name: Hyderabad
locations.description: Ideal for first-time divers with professional skydiving training centers.

locations.name: Aligarh
locations.description: Well-known for tandem skydiving and thrilling parachute jumps.

locations.name: Deesa
locations.description: India's first certified skydiving zone with lake views.

locations.name: Bir Billing
locations.description: Primarily known for paragliding but also offers skydiving experiences.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

locations.name: Jaisalmer
locations.description: Desert skydiving experience with panoramic views of golden dunes.

locations.name: Nagpur
locations.description: Emerging as an adventure hub with thrilling skydiving experiences.
